big krit: its feeling like one of those days dodging the sun watching for shade playing the game catching the fade doing what it takes to find a hole in this maze frankie beverly melody in the tape deck and checkin in the mirror for them ho laws tryna reach a quota so they so called control the atmosphere that i bogart good lord the streets aint safe no more i heard from a little bird that always strolled those curbs in the darkest alley where first come first serve the right time the night time for her but the day times blurred i knew her since the first grade she was fast i guess she never let up on the gas least but no least she had me for some cash the love of my lifes now a ghost in the past crash landed in the worst place i guess for some folk everyday aint they birthday we aint talkin car if we asking mercy you  think she wanna fuck what if she really thirsty holy water mama daughter i keep a shoulder for them to cry on cause even the strong need someone to rely on in these turbulent times we got to fly on so stand by stand by stand by stand by
